name: Loopy-Flight (Post Jam)
description:
Welcome to Loopy Flight.

A simple scrolling game where you try to control an airplane that just can't stop spinning.

And for some reason you have to eat clouds and avoid birds. Who knows?

Featuring:

- graphics stolen everywhere (but slowly replaced by personnal ones)

- awesomely poor animations

- sound effects googled with care

- the soundtrack of absolute silence (But coming soon)

- particles effects from outer space

- way too much sarcasm

- LOOPS

- LOOPS

- LOOPS

- LO... yeah you got this

It's the post jam version of the game I made during the Ludum Dare 47. It will get frequent-ish updates. Hope you'll like it!

Changes between Jam version and this:

- Backgrounds and scroll speed are change so it's easier on the eyes.

- Player rotation speed decreased to reduce diziness

- Change in scoring: now you get points each seconds and eating clouds gets you more points

- Overall change of UI

- Better instruction page
